sentence.Network_en: Talk that to someone else , Stevie : a pickmeup.
sentence.Network_cn: 跟旁人谈这去吧, 斯蒂维,找个野鸡什么的.

entry.tran: 提神的东西；使人兴奋的东西
entry.def: A pick-me-up is something that you have or do when you are tired or depressed in order to make you feel better.

example.ex: When you crave a pick-me-up, don't reach for chocolate or coffee — try peppermint oil instead...
example.tran: 如果想提神，不要吃巧克力或者喝咖啡，试试薄荷油。

example.ex: This is an ideal New Year pick-me-up — a five day holiday in the Bahamas.
example.tran: 这是一服理想的新年强心剂——巴哈马5日游。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
